mission_thread.ALPHA: HFO Bootstrapping: Orchestration, Mosaic Warfare, Galois Lattice, and Hive-8 swarm coordination.
mission_thread.OMEGA: Total Tool Virtualization: High-fidelity virtual tool creation (MediaPipe -> W3C Physics Cursor).

architecture.P0_OBSERVE: ISR: Intelligence, Surveillance, Reconnaissance. Multi-shard sensing (Tavily, ArXiv, DDG, GitHub, Repo, Wiki, Agents).
architecture.P1_BRIDGE: Data Fabric: Zod-backed schema bridge and cross-port coordination.
architecture.P2_SHAPE: Digital Twin: Physics-backed modeling and Rapier.js/Matter.js integration.
architecture.P3_INJECT: Kill-Web: W3C Event dispatch and FSM execution.
architecture.P4_DISRUPT: EW: Electronic Warfare. Negative feedback loops and Reward-Hacking suppression.
architecture.P5_IMMUNIZE: Force Protection: HardGate integrity checks and Forensic Auditing.
architecture.P6_ASSIMILATE: Logistics: Persistent telemetry and DuckDB knowledge storage.
architecture.P7_NAVIGATE: BMC2: Battle Management Command & Control. Semantic synthesis, baton handover, and mission navigation.
